short_description: Next-Gen Intel Core Ultra 5 Powerhouse – 10-core (6P + 4E) / 10-thread processor with turbo up to 4.9GHz and 20MB cache delivers fast, responsive performance for multitasking, productivity, and everyday content creation.
High-Speed DDR5 Memory & NVMe SSD Storage – DDR5 memory and PCIe 4.0 NVMe solid-state storage provide quick boot times, smooth app switching, and fast access to large files, games, and media.

Modern Connectivity with Wi-Fi 6E & Bluetooth 5.2 – Built-in Wi-Fi 6E (802.11ax 2x2), Gigabit Ethernet, and Bluetooth 5.2 deliver ultra-fast wireless speeds, reliable wired networking, and easy pairing with peripherals.

Versatile Ports for Any Setup – Front USB-C and USB-A 3.2 ports, multiple rear USB-A, HDMI 2.1, VGA, and audio jacks support monitors, external drives, and accessories, making this tower ideal for home, office, and school use.

Ideal for Business & Office Environments – Reliable tower PC designed for small and medium businesses, offering strong multitasking performance for office apps, video meetings, and web-based tools, easy integration into existing networks, and a professional Windows 11 environment that’s ready for deployment across teams.
product_description: The Lenovo IdeaCentre Tower with Intel Core Ultra 5 processor is a powerful and reliable desktop built for modern productivity. Designed with business users in mind, it delivers outstanding performance for multitasking, data processing, and office workflows. The latest Intel architecture provides responsive computing and smooth operation across multiple applications, while advanced cooling ensures stable performance even during heavy workloads. With high-speed DDR5 memory and NVMe solid-state storage, this system offers fast boot times and effortless file access, making it ideal for daily office use, content creation, and remote collaboration. Integrated Wi-Fi 6E and Bluetooth 5.2 enable fast, secure connections, and the full array of front and rear ports ensures easy setup with monitors, printers, and other peripherals. The spacious tower design allows for future expansion — add dedicated graphics, more storage, or extra memory as your business grows. Whether used in a small office, corporate environment, or home workspace, the Lenovo IdeaCentre Tower combines reliability, performance, and flexibility to keep your team productive and connected.

How a product becomes part of Amazon Renewed, your destination for pre-owned, refurbished products: A customer buys a new product and returns it or trades it in for a newer or different model. That product is inspected and tested to work and look like new by Amazon-qualified suppliers. Then, the product is sold as an Amazon Renewed product on Amazon. If not satisfied with the purchase, renewed products are eligible for replacement or refund under the Amazon Renewed Guarantee.
